segment.source: Deploy AppLocker policies by using the enforce rules setting (Windows 10)
segment.target: Deploy AppLocker policies by using the enforce rules setting (Windows 10)

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to deploy AppLocker policies by using the enforcement setting method.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to deploy AppLocker policies by using the enforcement setting method.

segment.source: Deploy AppLocker policies by using the enforce rules setting
segment.target: Deploy AppLocker policies by using the enforce rules setting

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to deploy AppLocker policies by using the enforcement setting method.
segment.target: This topic for IT professionals describes the steps to deploy AppLocker policies by using the enforcement setting method.

segment.source: Background and prerequisites
segment.target: Background and prerequisites

segment.source: These procedures assume that you have already deployed AppLocker policies with the enforcement set to Audit only, and you have been collecting data through the AppLocker event logs and other channels to determine what effect these policies have on your environment and the policy's adherence to your application control design.
segment.target: These procedures assume that you have already deployed AppLocker policies with the enforcement set to Audit only, and you have been collecting data through the AppLocker event logs and other channels to determine what effect these policies have on your environment and the policy's adherence to your application control design.

segment.source: For info about the AppLocker policy enforcement setting, see Understand AppLocker enforcement settings.
segment.target: For info about the AppLocker policy enforcement setting, see Understand AppLocker enforcement settings.

segment.source: For info about how to plan an AppLocker policy deployment, see AppLocker Design Guide.
segment.target: For info about how to plan an AppLocker policy deployment, see AppLocker Design Guide.

segment.source: Step 1: Retrieve the AppLocker policy
segment.target: Step 1: Retrieve the AppLocker policy

segment.source: Updating an AppLocker policy that is currently enforced in your production environment can have unintended results.
segment.target: Updating an AppLocker policy that is currently enforced in your production environment can have unintended results.

segment.source: Using Group Policy, you can export the policy from the Group Policy Object (GPO) and then update the rule or rules by using AppLocker on your AppLocker reference or test PC.
segment.target: Using Group Policy, you can export the policy from the Group Policy Object (GPO) and then update the rule or rules by using AppLocker on your AppLocker reference or test PC.

segment.source: For the procedure to do this, see Export an AppLocker policy from a GPO and Import an AppLocker policy into a GPO.
segment.target: For the procedure to do this, see Export an AppLocker policy from a GPO and Import an AppLocker policy into a GPO.

segment.source: For local AppLocker policies, you can update the rule or rules by using the Local Security policy snap-in (secpol.msc) on your AppLocker reference or test PC.
segment.target: For local AppLocker policies, you can update the rule or rules by using the Local Security policy snap-in (secpol.msc) on your AppLocker reference or test PC.

segment.source: For the procedures to do this, see Export an AppLocker policy to an XML file and Import an AppLocker policy from another computer.
segment.target: For the procedures to do this, see Export an AppLocker policy to an XML file and Import an AppLocker policy from another computer.

segment.source: Step 2: Alter the enforcement setting
segment.target: Step 2: Alter the enforcement setting

segment.source: Rule enforcement is applied only to a collection of rules, not to individual rules.
segment.target: Rule enforcement is applied only to a collection of rules, not to individual rules.

segment.source: AppLocker divides the rules into collections: executable files, Windows Installer files, packaged apps, scripts, and DLL files.
segment.target: AppLocker divides the rules into collections: executable files, Windows Installer files, packaged apps, scripts, and DLL files.

segment.source: By default, if enforcement is not configured and rules are present in a rule collection, those rules are enforced.
segment.target: By default, if enforcement is not configured and rules are present in a rule collection, those rules are enforced.

segment.source: For information about the enforcement setting, see Understand AppLocker Enforcement Settings.
segment.target: For information about the enforcement setting, see Understand AppLocker Enforcement Settings.

segment.source: For the procedure to alter the enforcement setting, see Configure an AppLocker policy for audit only.
segment.target: For the procedure to alter the enforcement setting, see Configure an AppLocker policy for audit only.

segment.source: Step 3: Update the policy
segment.target: Step 3: Update the policy

segment.source: You can edit an AppLocker policy by adding, changing, or removing rules.
segment.target: You can edit an AppLocker policy by adding, changing, or removing rules.

segment.source: However, you cannot specify a version for the AppLocker policy by importing additional rules.
segment.target: However, you cannot specify a version for the AppLocker policy by importing additional rules.

segment.source: To ensure version control when modifying an AppLocker policy, use Group Policy management software that allows you to create versions of GPOs.
segment.target: To ensure version control when modifying an AppLocker policy, use Group Policy management software that allows you to create versions of GPOs.

segment.source: An example of this type of software is the Advanced Group Policy Management feature from the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack.
segment.target: An example of this type of software is the Advanced Group Policy Management feature from the Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack.

segment.source: Caution: You should not edit an AppLocker rule collection while it is being enforced in Group Policy.
segment.target: Caution: You should not edit an AppLocker rule collection while it is being enforced in Group Policy.

segment.source: Because AppLocker controls what files are allowed to run, making changes to a live policy can create unexpected behavior.
segment.target: Because AppLocker controls what files are allowed to run, making changes to a live policy can create unexpected behavior.

segment.source: For the procedure to update the GPO, see Import an AppLocker policy into a GPO.
segment.target: For the procedure to update the GPO, see Import an AppLocker policy into a GPO.

segment.source: For the procedures to distribute policies for local PCs by using the Local Security Policy snap-in (secpol.msc), see Export an AppLocker policy to an XML file and Import an AppLocker policy from another computer.
segment.target: For the procedures to distribute policies for local PCs by using the Local Security Policy snap-in (secpol.msc), see Export an AppLocker policy to an XML file and Import an AppLocker policy from another computer.

segment.source: Step 4: Monitor the effect of the policy
segment.target: Step 4: Monitor the effect of the policy

segment.source: When a policy is deployed, it is important to monitor the actual implementation of that policy.
segment.target: When a policy is deployed, it is important to monitor the actual implementation of that policy.

segment.source: You can do this by monitoring your support organization's app access request activity and reviewing the AppLocker event logs.
segment.target: You can do this by monitoring your support organization's app access request activity and reviewing the AppLocker event logs.

segment.source: To monitor the effect of the policy, see Monitor Application Usage with AppLocker.
segment.target: To monitor the effect of the policy, see Monitor Application Usage with AppLocker.

segment.source: Additional resources
segment.target: Additional resources

segment.source: For steps to perform other AppLocker policy tasks, see Administer AppLocker.
segment.target: For steps to perform other AppLocker policy tasks, see Administer AppLocker.
